name: photo-of-the-day-march-12-2009
title: Photo Of The Day: March 12, 2009
author: Christy Frink
excerpt: Now, this is what we like to see! New contributor que.sera caught this series of action shots during that epic 8-0 massacre against our arch-nemesis, the Detroit Red Wings. contentEncoded:
Now, this is what we like to see! New contributor que.sera caught this series of action shots during that epic 8-0 massacre against our arch-nemesis, the Detroit Red Wings. The series captures Jerred Smithson smashing Brad Stuart into the wall with great force, which was only one of many beautiful moments that we hope will be immortalized on the internets for years to come.

Photo Of The Day will be a recurring feature for Nashvillest as long you keep giving us stuff to post. Don’t worry–we’ll give you props. Just add them to the pool or tag them with “Nashvillest” if you’re feeling lazy.
